tool_description: Query & real-time stream API covering analyst ratings, earnings, FDA drug approvals, press releases and more than 20K new articles daily
name: Stock Market News
title: Stock Market News

api_list.name: Query API
api_list.description:
The query API allows you to search and filter articles in the entire news corpus across all sources. 

Filter by company ticker, sources, topics, date ranges and more. 

Built complex query structures with Lucene syntax.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-market-news.p.rapidapi.com/public/actions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-market-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-market-news.p.rapidapi.com/public/actions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-market-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
